-  playable 

Type Property# playable

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
static var playable: MPMovieLoadState { get }
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/mediaplayer/mpmovieloadstate/playable#Discussion)

The buffer has enough data that playback can begin, but it may run out of data before playback finishes.
